SEARCH
程序包 sim

类 SimplePoolSimulator

java.lang.Object
sim.SimplePoolSimulator
所有已实现的接口:
PoolSimulator
public class SimplePoolSimulator extends Object implements PoolSimulator
This class implements a simple pool simulator with only simple type and friction type

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SimplePoolSimulator

      public SimplePoolSimulator(int width, int height, String type) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructor of SimplePoolSimulator.
      参数:
      width - the width of the table.
      height - the width of the table.
      type - one of the "simple" and "friction" type of the table.
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the width and height are negative and if type is not "simple" or "friction"

  • 方法详细资料

    • start

      public void start(int x, int y, int radius, int speed, double dx, double dy) throws IllegalArgumentException
      从接口复制的说明: PoolSimulator
      Start the simulation with a ball at the given position, with the given radius and velocity.
      指定者:
      start 在接口中 PoolSimulator
      参数:
      x - the x-coordinate of the center of the ball
      y - the y-coordinate of the center of the ball
      radius - the radius of the ball
      speed - the current speed of the ball
      dx - the direction in x-coordinate of the ball
      dy - the direction in y-coordinate of the ball
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid

      从接口复制的说明: PoolSimulator

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Find the status of the simulation at the current step.
      指定者:
      getStatus 在接口中 PoolSimulator
      返回:
      a string "Status: SSS": where SSS is one of "Ball not set up", "Simulation started", "Ball hit bottom edge", "Ball hit top edge", "Ball hit left edge", "Ball hit right edge", "Ball is stationary".
